Values: Should be a folder listed in the configuration ``atlite: cutouts:`` (e.g. 'europe-2013-era5') or reference an existing folder in the directory ``cutouts``. Source module must be ERA5.
Description: Specifies the directory where the relevant weather data ist stored.

Values: One of turbine types included in `atlite <https://github.com/PyPSA/atlite/tree/master/atlite/resources/windturbine>`__
Description: Specifies the turbine type and its characteristic power curve.
Allowable density of wind turbine placement.
Correction factor for capacity factor time series.
Resolution on which to perform geographical elibility analysis.

Values: Any *realistic* subset of the `CORINE Land Cover code list <http://www.eea.europa.eu/data-and-maps/data/corine-land-cover-2006-raster-1/corine-land-cover-classes-and/clc_legend.csv/at_download/file>`_
Description: Specifies areas according to CORINE Land Cover codes which are generally eligible for AC-connected offshore wind turbine placement.
Switch to exclude `Natura 2000 <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natura_2000>`_ natural protection areas. Area is excluded if ``true``.
Ship density threshold from which areas are excluded.
Maximum sea water depth at which wind turbines can be build. Maritime areas with deeper waters are excluded in the process of calculating the AC-connected offshore wind potential.
Minimum distance to the shore below which wind turbines cannot be build.
Maximum distance to the shore above which wind turbines cannot be build.
Method to compute the maximal installable potential for a node; confer :ref:`renewableprofiles`
To avoid too small values in the renewables` per-unit availability time series values below this threshold are set to zero.
